Name: Inspect popup overlays
Description: Can I inspect the popup overlay elements like the Dropdown lists, menus, etc.,

Notes: 1. Open the **Command Menu** (`Cmd+Shift+P` or `Ctrl+Shift+P`) > Run "Show Rendering" to open the **Rendering** drawer.
2. Scroll down and select **Emulate a focused page** option to inspect the popup element in DevTools.
